price: Waɗanda ke iyar da Manzancin Allah, kuma sunã tsõronSa, kuma bã su tsõron kõwa fãce Allah, Kuma Allah Ya isa Ya zama Mai hisabi.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُبَلِّغُونَ رِسَٰلَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَخۡشَوۡنَهُۥ وَلَا يَخۡشَوۡنَ أَحَدًا إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ حَسِيبٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yuballighūna risālāti al-lahi wayakhshawnahu walā yakhshawna aḥadan illā al-laha wakafā bil-lahi ḥasīban
